name: LEDnotify

screenshots.caption: Indicator Applet - Pidgin - on the menu

short_description:
Use a USB LED notifier unit to inform you of new email, pidgin messages, and other events.

A general purpose, configurable tool for alerts.

Please leave me feedback here (under " Discussion") or with comments to my Blog, or even via email (irdroid3 AT gmail.com)

* Blog: http://irdroid3.wordpress.com/

* wiki pages : https://sourceforge.net/p/lednotify/wiki/Home/

* Animated gif demo: http://irdroid3.files.wordpress.com/2013/06/lednotify_dream-cheeky.gif?w=830

2014-02-10 - V2.0.1 : Available for download

2013-08-29 - V1.1.7 : In progress - see blog

2013-08-09 - V1.1.6 : Uploaded

2013-08-07 - V1.1.5 : Uploaded

Originally based on dBird notifier :
http://dbirdnotifier.sourceforge.net/
summary: USB LED Alerts - for gmail, email, pidgin, etc...
